Hi, I’m Stefan—a quantitative social scientist with a passion for financial markets, politics, data, and basketball. Welcome to my website where you can find my CV, personal projects, and more details about my work and myself.

I’ve studied in the Netherlands and Hungary, lived and worked in Serbia, and now I’m based in Germany, where I’m building my career as a data professional. Feel free to explore and get in touch!

### Professional Summary

Data Analyst & Researcher (R \| SQL \| Python) with 4 years’ expertise in research design, statistical modeling, visualization and data-driven consulting. Currently (through September 30, 2025) contributing to a European Research Council–funded political risk assessment project at Witten/Herdecke University. I collect, clean, and transform complex datasets; build and validate statistical models; and document and present data‑driven insights on political and economic risks in Europe. Proven track record of streamlining workflows, boosting project efficiency, and informing strategic decision‑making through rigorous analysis.
